1.title: Ronda Rousey vs Miesha Tate
1.plot: Experience the incredible sights and sounds of this women's bantamweight title bout from the perspective of the people who lived it. Watch Ronda Rousey vs Miesha Tate again.

2.title: Renan Barao vs TJ Dillashaw
2.plot: UFC Fight Flashback: Barao vs Dillashaw is an enhanced replay of the one of the best title fights in UFC history, featuring never-before-seen footage from state-of-the-art, specialty cameras.

3.title: Johny Hendricks vs. Robbie Lawler
3.plot: Fight Flashback: Hendricks vs Lawler is an enhanced replay of the one of the most memorable fights in UFC history, featuring never-before-seen footage from state-of-the-art cameras, and exclusive.

4.title: Demetrious Johnson vs Joseph Benavidez
4.plot: Demetrious Johnson and Joseph Benavidez both had success as bantamweights before competing in the new flyweight division tournament.

5.title: Jon Jones vs. Alexander Gustafsson
5.plot: Beginning with their arrivals at the arena, inside the locker rooms, into the Octagon, through the epic fight, and the aftermath, experience the incredible sights and sounds of this light.

6.title: Chris Weidman vs. Lyoto Machida
6.plot: Watch Chris Weidman vs Lyoto Machida again, like you've never seen it before. Beginning with their arrivals at the arena, inside the locker rooms, into the Octagon, through the epic fight.

7.title: Georges St-Pierre vs Johny Hendricks
7.plot: St-Pierre vs Hendricks is an enhanced replay of the one of the most memorable fights in UFC history, featuring never-before-seen footage from state-of-the-art cameras, and exclusive new sound.

8.title: Jose Aldo vs Chad Mendes 2
8.plot: Hailed as the greatest featherweight title fight of all-time, the UFC 179 rematch between pound-for-pound legend Jose Aldo and heated rival Chad Mendes became an instant classic.

9.title: Daniel Cormier vs Anthony Johnson
9.plot: Take a look back at an enhanced replay of the light heavyweight title match-up between Daniel Cormier and Anthony Johnson at UFC 187.

11.title: Cain Velasquez vs Junior Dos Santos 3
11.plot: Beginning with their arrivals at the arena, inside the locker rooms, into the Octagon, through the epic fight, and the aftermath, experience the incredible sights and sounds of this heavyweight.

12.title: Georges St-Pierre vs Johny Hendricks
12.plot: UFC Fight Flashback: St-Pierre vs Hendricks" is an enhanced replay of the one of the most memorable fights in UFC history, featuring never-before-seen footage from state-of-the-art cameras.

13.title: Jose Aldo vs Chad Mendes 2
13.plot: Hailed as the greatest featherweight title fight of all-time, the UFC 179 rematch between pound-for-pound legend Jose Aldo and heated rival Chad Mendes became an instant classic.

14.title: Daniel Cormier vs Anthony Johnson
14.plot: Take a look back at the light heavyweight title match-up between Daniel Cormier and Anthony Johnson at UFC 187, like you've never seen it before.

15.title: Anderson Silva vs Chris Weidman
15.plot: An enhanced replay of the one of the best fights in UFC history, featuring never-before-seen footage from state-of-the-art, specialty cameras, and exclusive new sound captured from all corners.

1.title: McGregor vs Mendes
1.plot: UFC Fight Flashback: Mendes vs. McGregor is an enhanced replay of the one of the most high-profile title fights in UFC history, the featherweight showdown between "The Notorious" Conor McGregor and powerhouse Chad "Money" Mendes. From the locker rooms to the victory celebration, UFC Fight Flashback brings you never-before-seen footage of all the action from an unforgettable night.

2.title: Jones vs Cormier 1
2.plot: After years of trash talk, witness the culmination of one of the UFC's greatest rivalries as Jon Jones seeks to silence his bitter adversary Daniel Cormier at UFC 182.

3.title: McGregor vs Diaz 1
3.plot: In March of 2016, the unlikely bout between featherweight champion Conor McGregor and lightweight contender Nate Diaz turned into the biggest event in UFC memory. See a replay of that unforgettable night featuring never-before-seen footage and exclusive audio from both corners. From the arrivals at the arena through the epic fight and its aftermath, experience the sights and sounds of the UFC 196 main event from the perspective of the men who lived it.

4.title: Diaz vs McGregor 2
4.plot: This Emmy Award-winning episode of UFC Fight Flashback revisits the momentous second bout with unprecedented access behind the scenes and inside the Octagon. With exclusive, previously unseen footage of the fighters, their corners and the aftermath, you'll experience the UFC 202 main event like never before.

5.title: Woodley vs Thompson 1
5.plot: At the historic UFC 205 event in New York City, welterweight champion Tyron Woodley defended his freshly-earned title against devastating kick boxer Stephen "Wonderboy" Thompson. UFC Fight Flashback is an enhanced replay of their memorable bout, featuring never-before-seen footage and exclusive new sound captured from all corners. Beginning with their arrivals at the famed Madison Square Garden all the way through the post-fight press conference, you'll see the epic clash from all new-perspectives -- including the chaos that ensued inside the Octagon when the shocking...

7.title: Cruz vs Garbrandt
7.plot: In 2016, polished veteran Dominick Cruz took on brash young challenger Cody Garbrandt in a championship bout that became an instant classic. Beyond the stellar action inside the Octagon, the fight capped a nearly ten-year-long feud between Cruz and members of Garbrandt's training camp, and marked the fulfillment of a promise made to a young cancer patient. UFC Fight Flashback takes you inside this match with enhanced replays, previously unreleased footage and exclusive audio from both corners. From the arrivals at the arena through the epic battle and one fighter's ...

imdb.plot outline: This Emmy Award winning series is an enhanced replay of the biggest fights, featuring never-before-seen footage from state-of-the-art, specialty cameras, and exclusive new sound captured from all corners. Experience the incredible sights and sounds of a UFC main event from the perspective of the people who lived it.
